glossentry.glossdef:
Common Product Enumeration (CPE) is a scheme used by the to identify vulnerable products (software and hardware). A CPE has a defined structure consisting of several parts:
cpe:<cpe_version>:<part>:<vendor>:<product>:<version>:<update>:<edition>: <language>:<sw_edition>:<target_sw>: <target_hw>:<other>
With a CPE several vulnerabilities () can be associated.
